name: swa-github-role-sync-ops
description: Monorepo harness for swa-github-role-sync and swa-github-discussion-cleanup

scripts.format:write: npm run format:write --workspace actions/role-sync && npm run format:write --workspace actions/discussion-cleanup
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace actions/role-sync && npm run format:check --workspace actions/discussion-cleanup
scripts.test: npm run ci-test --workspace actions/role-sync && npm run ci-test --workspace actions/discussion-cleanup
scripts.package: npm run package --workspace actions/role-sync && npm run package --workspace actions/discussion-cleanup
scripts.verify: npm run verify:role-sync && npm run verify:discussion-cleanup
